caption.p: Reaction of [K([18]crown‐6)][Cp*Fe(C 10H 8)] with 2‐(2′‐pyridyl)‐4,6‐diphenylphosphinine ( L) forming 1‐σ and 1‐π; i) L, DME, −35 °C to RT, −naphthalene; ii) 1 equiv. [K([18]crown‐6)][Cp*Fe(C 10H 8)], 2 equiv. L, toluene/THF , −35 °C to RT; iii) 1 equiv. [K([18]crown‐6)][Cp*Fe(C 10H 8)], THF.
